recipeList.directions: 1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.  2. Heat 1 cup of oil in a pan over medium heat.  3. Fry the potatoes in the pan for 5 minutes.  4. Add 3 cups of French fries to the pan and fry for an additional 5 minutes.  5. Remove the French fries and potatoes from the pan and transfer to a baking sheet.  6. Bake in the oven for 20 minutes.  7. In the same pan, add 3 cups of chicken to the remaining oil and fry for 5 minutes.  8. Remove the chicken from the pan and combine with the French fries and potatoes on the baking sheet.  9. Bake everything in the oven for an additional 15 minutes. 10. Serve and enjoy!
recipeList.ingredients: French fries (3 cups), potatoes (3 cups), chicken (3 cups), oil (1 cup)
